dir.name: [B]HIGHLIGHT ITEM BUT DO NOT SELECT ITEM, SOME ITEMS SCROLL[/B]

[COLOR aqua]Keep updated ..... on issues affecting OpenView service ..... check your test video plays ..... if test video plays check your internet connection .....[/COLOR][COLOR lime] contact openviewhelp@gmail.com .....[/COLOR][COLOR aqua] Enjoy ..... [/COLOR]
[COLOR magenta]MAGENTA = SEVERE[/COLOR] ... [COLOR yellow]YELLOW = MODERATE[/COLOR] ... [COLOR lime]GREEN = INFO[/COLOR]

[COLOR magenta]No content in 1Channel ... every folder empty ... cause is 1Channel using software robot to check if you are human! ... wait 24 hours and retry [/COLOR][COLOR aqua]10th March 2014[/COLOR]
[COLOR yellow]Some of the EarthCams cause OpenView to hang, you will need to reboot [/COLOR][COLOR aqua]2nd March 2014[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]BillionUploads server works on third attemt in Mash Up[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]BillionUploads server works in Icefilms and 1Channel[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]Some 180Upload server captchas are too hard to read, they come and go![/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]HugeGiles server captchas? Just try a few times and they will go.[/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]We recommend Hackermils on MashUp, a true hero![/COLOR]
[COLOR lime]Buffering is more likely at weekends (Sundays!) because of heavier traffic.[/COLOR]
